div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1876 Paestum (anc. Poseidonia), Lucania, 1939 Burial: c. 500 B.C. Contents: 22 incuse AR. Found SE of "Tem- ple of Ceres" Poseidonia: 3 st.; 18 dr. Velia: 1 dr. Disposition: Naples Pozzi, AIIN 1962-4, pp. 77-82, illus. The Poseidonia AE associated with this find is presumably intrusive
